text: "Better" is a song performed by German singers Lena Meyer-Landrut and Nico Santos. The song was released as a digital download on 16 August 2019 by Universal Music Group. The song peaked at number 15 on the German Singles Chart. The song also charted in Austria and Switzerland. ==Background== The song is about relationships, it is how the couple thought they were for each other but it wasn’t mean to be. They are both signing how their love for each other was not enough and how they wish each other well and how they won’t find someone else better. ==Music video== A music video to accompany the release of "Better" was first released onto YouTube on 30 August 2019. ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {|class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center;" |- !
